name: Verbal Verdict
description:
The rising rates of criminal activity in Brooklyn has evolved into a challenge for the city's residents. Recognizing the urgency of the situation, the police force has recruited fresh, new talent to combat this growing problem– and that individual is none other than you!

Embark on a journey to prove yourself as a novice investigator, solving cases and steadily climbing the ranks within the police corps. Your ultimate goal? To be known as the greatest investigator in the city!




Immerse yourself in Verbal Verdict, a captivating detective game where your words shape the investigation. As an investigator, you'll interrogate suspects using a blend of good cop, bad cop tactics and cross examinations. Powered by a large language model, every question you ask shapes the responses of the suspects, leading you down twisting paths to the truth. Your real-world knowledge and investigative skills are your greatest assets in cracking each case. Dive into the world of Verbal Verdict and unleash your inner detective to solve intricate puzzles and unravel mysteries. Can you handle the challenge?




Every case in Verbal Verdict presents unique narratives and challenges. However, beneath these individual stories lies a city besieged by deeper, more intertwined issues. Uncover these underlying problems by picking up on subtle clues scattered throughout your investigations. Piece together these hints to reveal the true extent of the crisis gripping the city, and work to resolve the overarching dilemma that ties all your cases together.
